channel.title: FLF - The Rebel Podcast
channel.description: FIGHT LAUGH FEAST PRESENTS SHOWS PROCLAIMING THE LORDSHIP OF CHRIST OVER ALL OF LIFE.
channel.itunes:author: FLF, LLC

item.title: Is Gary DeMar A Full Preterist? [The Rebel Podcast]
item.description:
Preterism; full, partial, a little, alot?  Controversy has been swirling!  Has Gary DeMar, AKA Uncle Gary, gone full preterist?  We don't know.  DeMar has been a great apologist for the Chrstian faith for many years, so it's wise not to jump to conclusions and rush to judgement. Today the Rebels give their thoughts.

To support the show you can become a Fight Laugh Feast Club Member here: flfnetwork.com/membership/

You can also join the rebellion by sharing and inviting your friends to like the content on facebook: facebook.com/rebelpodcast or by supporting us through patreon at patreon.com/reformedrebel
item.author: pastors Nate & Chris - the Rebels
item.itunes:author: pastors Nate & Chris - the Rebels

item.title: Can We Sing That Song? [The Rebel Podcast]
item.description: What about that Hillsong or Bethel Music worship song?  Should we sing those songs in our church?  Many people have lots to say about this issue, but today the Rebels weigh in.  Here's what Nate & Chris have to say about it.
item.author: pastors Nate & Chris - the Rebels
item.itunes:author: pastors Nate & Chris - the Rebels
